alert.note: Alert for Collier; Glades; Hendry (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 16 at 10:11AM EST until January 16 at 11:00AM EST by NWS Miami
info.description: The National Weather Service in Miami has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... North central Collier County in southwestern Florida... Northwestern Hendry County in southern Florida... Southwestern Glades County in southern Florida... * Until 1100 AM EST. * At 1010 AM EST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Labelle to near Lehigh Acres, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Labelle, Moore Haven, Montura, Port La Belle and Felda. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 300 PM EST for southern and southwestern Florida. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 300 PM EST for southern and southwestern Florida.
